page.title: 07A PAINT FACTORY
page.content: Berger Industrial Coating is one of at least 2O factories on Selinas Lane,Dagenham.The factory has been here since 1933.It employs 659 people.7O%of the employees are men and 3O% are women.The site was chosen because the land was available and the area is close to main roads.The main products are paint coating for toys and cars.The products are mainly for the home market.Training is required to work in the factory.The employees work 37.5 hours a week.The factory has a social and sports club.Berger Paints also has factories in the north_east and south_west of Britain.
